Job Title: Controller

Location: El Paso, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Description

Are you ready to put your skills to the test? Are you excited about the idea of working with a reputable Staffing & Recruitment company? If so, Robert Half may have the position for you. Your tasks as Controller will include financial statement preparation and consolidation, account analysis and reconciliations, and forecasting, audit preparation, and internal control maintenance and regulatory reporting. High-level analytical skills are a must. Beyond solid compensation, this full-time role comes with excellent benefits and the opportunity to grow. Located in El Paso, Texas, this Senior Accountant role is with a company in the Staffing field.

Your responsibilities

 Assist in coordinating quarterly reviews and testing with internal and external auditors Continuously analyze current automation of the accounting and reporting process and present improvement suggestions Uphold company standards when working with business partners to ensure compliance with corporate accounting policies, procedures and controls; while also providing support on special requests when required Prepare monthly consolidated P& L and Balance Sheet flux analysis for management reporting Delegate resources to Ad-hoc projects as necessary Execute monthly accounting close procedures and deliverables (journal entries, reconciliations, reports) in compliance with GAAP Supply Balance Sheet account reconciliations Offer involvement in various department-wide initiatives Present analysis on financial results such as trends, performance metrics, benchmarks, etc.


Requirements

 - BA/BS in Accounting preferred master's degree


5+ years of full cycle accounting experience,

 Demonstrated analytical abilities, tendency to quickly connect dots and surmise logical outcomes Accounts Receivable (AR) experience General ledger experience Adeptness in account reconciliation Journal entries experience preferred Practical knowledge of Collections General familiarity with W2/W3 Solid understanding of Accounts Payable (AP) Demonstrated knowledge of month end closings Skilled with ERP systems Self-starter with efficient time management and organizational skills Previous experience in public accounting is highly valued Observant, accurate and able to thrive in a fast-paced environment Strong communication skills, both verbally and in writing Comfortable working in a changing and dynamic environment Able to manage time well Ability and willingness to meet business critical deadlines


Robert Half is the world’s first and largest specialized talent solutions firm that connects highly qualified job seekers to opportunities at great companies. We offer contract, temporary and permanent placement solutions for finance and accounting, technology, marketing and creative, legal, and administrative and customer support roles.

Robert Half works to put you in the best position to succeed. We provide access to top jobs, competitive compensation and benefits, and free online training. Stay on top of every opportunity - whenever you choose - even on the go.

All applicants applying for U.S. job openings must be legally authorized to work in the United States. Benefits are available to contract/temporary professionals, including medical, vision, dental, and life and disability insurance. Hired contract/temporary professionals are also eligible to enroll in our company 401(k) plan. Visit
